Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, you! Interested in my <clr:0000>compendium
database<clr:ffff>, I see...
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>My collection is complete! It has every
creature, monster, material, treasure,
and piece of equipment.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's basically the same thing as the
<clr:0000>Hyrule Compendium<clr:ffff> you've got on your
Purah Padâ€”except mine's finished.
When you take a <clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff> of these kinds
of subjects, they'll be <clr:0000>registered in your
compendium<clr:ffff>.
I've got some mighty elusive entries in
my collection. You might find it a real
challenge to get them on your own...
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Say, I'll tell you what. I'll sell you
<clr:0000>pictures <clr:ffff>that help fill out the gaps
in your compendium.
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What's with that face?<sp:5:0:0> Do you know how
hard I worked to complete this?!

All that work is priceless, so a few rupees
is a great deal!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Look, no pressure. But if you want some
<clr:0000>pictures<clr:ffff> from <clr:0000>my compendium<clr:ffff>, just let
me know.
Talk_2012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>Can't add any more of that picture type,
I'm afraid.
Talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, you! Looks like my complete
<clr:0000>compendium <clr:ffff>has taken your fancy.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>No wonder! Collecting all those pictures
was no small feat, I'll tell you. And since
I know just how tough it is...
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll tell you what. If you want some
pictures from my compendium, I'll be
glad to sell them to you.
Talk_2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>By category, here's what's missing from
the <clr:0000>pictures <clr:ffff>in your Purah Pad.
Talk_2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Completing a compendium can take a
lot of effort. Never give up!

And remember that <clr:0000>my compendium<clr:ffff> is
always here for you, anytime you need
more help filling yours out.
Talk_2015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>Hyrule Compendium<clr:ffff> records all the
creatures, monsters, materials, treasure,
and equipment out there.
Your compendium is in your <clr:0000>Purah Pad<clr:ffff>.
And that's where I keep my collection.

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00><clr:ffff>If you take a picture of these subjects
with your <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>, they'll be <clr:0000>registered in
your compendium<clr:ffff>. Neat, right?
Talk_2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Don't miss a chance to use that <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>,
got it?
Talk_2016: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Hmph. Did you finish up your business?
Talk_2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, you! You're sure interested in my
complete compendium, aren't you?

It's perfect, so I don't blame you!
Talk_2017:
You can also take<clr:0000> self-portraits<clr:ffff>, too, that
work with your compendium.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Imagine taking a picture with weapons!<sp:5:1:0>
You could see your face all over your
collection. Don't forget to say, "cheese!"
Talk_2005:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Select a category, then I'll choose what
you get <clr:0000>based on what's missing<clr:ffff>.
Talk_2018:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, you!<sp:5:1:0>


I'm all sold out of the pictures I had
in stock!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>But there's no stopping an inquisitive
mind like mine! Perhaps very soon, I'll
get some new pictures!
And then you'll just have to come back!
Of course, you will always be welcome.
Talk_2008:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>Hey now. No money, no shopping.
That's the rules.
